translations: n．住所，居住地：一个人或一群人居住的地方。
· The family has several abodes in different countries.
这个家庭在不同的国家有几处住所。

sentences.sentence: They built a outstanding bulk of abodes.
There are wilderness abodes that are considered dubious and risky.
sentences.translation: 有些地区是可疑和危险的。

sentences.sentence: Then many angels left their heavenly abodes to establish their own kingdom.
sentences.translation: 随后许多天使离开了天堂，去建立他们自己的王国。
